item.title: The Winterkeeper
item.description: The Guardian’s The Winterkeeper: A Lifetime Spent Protecting Yellowstone National Park is a beautiful short documentary I truly enjoyed watching. A little research on Steven Fuller, the protagonist, allowed me to dig out some promising reading material. Subscribe to the newsletter, the RSS feed, or follow me on Mastodon
